features.Draconic Ancestry: Choose a dragon type for breath weapon and damage resistance.
features.Breath Weapon: Exhale destructive energy based on your draconic ancestry.
features.Damage Resistance: Resistance to the damage type associated with your ancestry.

features.Darkvision: See in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light.
features.Dwarven Resilience: Advantage on saving throws against poison, resistance to poison damage.
features.Dwarven Combat Training: Proficiency with battleaxe, handaxe, throwing hammer, and warhammer.
features.Tool Proficiency: Proficiency with one set of artisan's tools.
features.Stonecunning: Advantage on History checks related to the origin of stonework.

features.Dwarven Toughness: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you level.

features.Dwarven Armor Training: Proficiency with light and medium armor.

features.Darkvision: See in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light.
features.Fey Ancestry: Advantage on saving throws against being charmed, immune to magic sleep.
features.Trance: Don't need to sleep; meditate for 4 hours to gain a long rest.

features.Elf Weapon Training: Proficiency with longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow.
features.Cantrip: You know one cantrip of your choice from the wizard spell list.
features.Extra Language: You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choice.

features.Elf Weapon Training: Proficiency with longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow.
features.Fleet of Foot: Your base walking speed increases to 35 feet.
features.Mask of the Wild: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

features.Superior Darkvision: See in dim light within 120 feet as if it were bright light.
features.Sunlight Sensitivity: Disadvantage on attack rolls and Perception checks that rely on sight when in direct sunlight.
features.Drow Magic: You know the Dancing Lights cantrip. At level 3, you can cast Faerie Fire once per long rest. At level 5, you can cast Darkness once per long rest.
features.Drow Weapon Training: Proficiency with rapiers, shortswords, and hand crossbows.

features.Darkvision: See in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light.
features.Gnome Cunning: Advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

features.Natural Illusionist: You know the Minor Illusion cantrip.
features.Speak with Small Beasts: You can communicate simple ideas with Small or smaller beasts.

features.Artificer's Lore: Add twice your proficiency bonus to History checks related to magic items, alchemical objects, or technological devices.
features.Tinker: Use tools to craft small mechanical devices.

features.Ability Score Increase: Charisma +2, two other ability scores of your choice +1 each.
features.Darkvision: See in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light.
features.Fey Ancestry: Advantage on saving throws against being charmed, immune to magic sleep.
features.Skill Versatility: Proficiency in two skills of your choice.

features.Darkvision: See in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light.
features.Relentless Endurance: When reduced to 0 HP but not killed outright, drop to 1 HP instead once per long rest.
features.Savage Attacks: When you score a critical hit with a melee weapon, roll one additional damage die.

features.Lucky: When you roll a 1 on a d20 for an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, reroll the die.
features.Brave: Advantage on saving throws against being frightened.
features.Halfling Nimbleness: Move through the space of any creature larger than you.

features.Naturally Stealthy: You can attempt to hide even when you are obscured by a creature that is at least one size larger than you.

features.Stout Resilience: Advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance to poison damage.

Standard Human.description: Standard Humans are adaptable and versatile, excelling in all areas equally.

features.Ability Score Increase: Two different ability scores of your choice +1 each.
features.Skill: Gain proficiency in one skill of your choice.
features.Feat: Gain one feat of your choice at 1st level.

Variant Human.description: Variant Humans forgo a universal ability boost for more focused versatility, gaining a skill proficiency and a feat at 1st level.

languages: One extra language of your choice

features.Darkvision: See in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light.
features.Infernal Legacy: You know the Thaumaturgy cantrip. At level 3, you can cast Hellish Rebuke once per long rest. At level 5, you can cast Darkness once per long rest.
